Text: Dude, do you really believe this nonsense ? omg man grow a brain !

If you want to learn about the truth of the jewish people,go to a sinagog and ask for information...don't go to anti-semitics like "talmud stupidass timmy" to learn false kabbalah

TT, don't worry about the unregenerates. What you are doing is really good. Satan needs to be exposed in all his forms.  Judaism is as evil today as it was in the time of Jesus. Even the Jews called Jesus a deceiver.  They hated Him because He spoke the truth and revealed their dirty laundry. ONLY Nicodemus had enough sense to go see Him and find out the truth.  Judaism is an amalgamation of numerous religions, mostly Sumerian.  It is interesting that the Jews are  often the ones who oppose you so strongly and show so much hatred.  I talk about Judaism a lot in my weekly Bible study.  One has to only read the gospel of John to see how much the Jews hated Jesus and how much HE hated Judaism.  Telling people they are children of the Devil is pretty heavy stuff.  Keep up the witness. God bless!
